original_text: and not only by his coming but also by the comfort with which he was comforted by you, as he told us of your longing, your mourning, your zeal for me, so that I rejoiced still more.
korean_text: 그가 온 것뿐 아니요 오직 그가 너희에게서 받은 그 위로로 위로하고 너희의 사모함과 애통함과 나를 위하여 열심 있는 것을 우리에게 보고함으로 나를 더욱 기쁘게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: and not only by his coming
with which he was comforted by you
as he told us of your longing
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희의 갈망을 우리에게 말한 것처럼

sentences.original_text: so that I rejoiced still more
